it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.effects

Interface Effect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainsawEffect, CyberbladeEffect, ElectroscytheEffect, FlamethrowerEffect, FurnaceEffect, GrenadeLauncherEffect, HeatseekerEffect, HellionEffect, LaserMagnumEffect, LockRifleEffect, MachineGunEffect, NewtonEffect, PlasmaGunEffect, PowerGloveEffect, RailgunEffect, RocketLauncherEffect, ShockwaveEffect, ShotgunEffect, SledgehammerEffect, TagbackGrenadeEffect, TargetingScopeEffect, TeleportEffect, THOREffect, TractorBeamEffect, VortexCannonEffect, WhisperEffect, ZX2Effect
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Effect
    A simple function that represents the behaviour of a card. Thanks to reflection, implementations of this interface can be seen as importable assets.
    See Also:
    for possible features that can be used to create a card effect.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(EffectManager manager, Player actor) 

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply(EffectManager manager,
           Player actor)
    throws UndoException
        Parameters:
        manager - The effect manager that provides the context for this effect.
        actor - The player associated to the user that executes this effect.
        Throws:
        UndoException - if the user requested to undo the last action.
